name: Blast Cats: Nightmare Demo
description:
THE GAME

An expedition into an ancient tomb awakens a powerful wish granting genie, and all hell breaks loose! Take control of C.C, the pink cat with a knack for explosions, as she tries to undo the evil genie’s curse!

"Send these spirits back where they came from!"

THE DEMO

The Blast Cats Nightmare Demo offers you about an hour of game-play centered around a haunted mansion, filled with ghouls and ghosts galore! Hidden throughout are six fantastical bonus levels to keep your blood pumping!

"No zombie stands a chance against the hammer! Don't even try it!"

THE FUTURE

Blast Cats is in continuous development and current plans are for the full product to be roughly 8 to 10 times larger than this demo! Wishlisting on Steam can help production as it gets the word out and makes the Steam algorithm happy. Demos will be released periodically as development continues! Lets work together to make this game something speclal, OK?

"Drive it like you stole it! One of the many Bonus Levels you can find!"

Download times got you down? Listen to some of the soundtrack while its going!
